title: Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Online Learning Success

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: Accessibility-optimized design for smartphone-based learning, considering all learners including students with disabilities

learning_goals: Learners can adhere to personal learning plans and execution strategies with over 80% compliance within four weeks
Learners can apply three or more self-directed learning strategies using online tools (scheduling apps, digital notes, etc.)
Learners can submit weekly learning outcomes at 100% through a peer feedback system and develop improvement plans
Learners can comply with digital content creation guidelines reflecting accessibility requirements with over 90% adherence

constraints.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA 기준 준수(색상 대비 4.5:1, 키보드 네비게이션 지원)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
